services.head: Financial Planning
services.desc: Partnerz FP works with individual clients and employers to deliver cut-through financial planning services. We have been very instrumental in reshaping the lives of redundant bankers who suffered the banking crises by helping them build emergency funds beforehand.

services.head: Investments
services.desc: Diasporians looking to invest in the service sectors now have a trusted partner. We also saved GHâ‚µ1.6 million of clients money from the Menzgold-Bitcoin bust by asking them to withdraw or sell off. We believe we owe our clients that fiduciary responsibility

services.head: Scheme Administration
services.desc: Currently working with 19 different unions/associations/churches. With over 21,384 members under their belt, we are forgin a future for their membership using the very principles of financial planning at a large scale.

services.head: Strategy Consulting
services.desc: Gradually, we are becoming a household name in the starup ecosystem in Ghana. We have advised 12+ startups from ideation to funding, go-to-market strategies, and to first 1000 customers.
